snippet: So far this year, individuals with more than $1 million in available assets provided 10 percent of the capital raised by private equity firms globally, according to Triago, an advisory firm.
abstract: So far this year, individuals with more than $1 million in available assets provided 10 percent of the capital raised by private equity firms globally, according to Triago, an advisory firm.

headline.main: In Private Equity, Individual Investors Take a Bigger Role
